snippet: A bill that would let mothers abandon their babies in emergency rooms within 72 hours of birth won unanimous approval from the Senate today....
lead_paragraph: A bill that would let mothers abandon their babies in emergency rooms within 72 hours of birth won unanimous approval from the Senate today.
abstract: California Senate unanimously approves bill to let mothers abandon newborns anonymously in hospital emergency rooms within 72 hours of birth without fear of prosecution (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; California Senate Passes Baby Abandonment Bill
